ygData.subject: Re: Best 1hs (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m currently having fun with a Dragoon Dirk (23 delay 6 dmg ) and a Barbed Leather Whip (28 delay 7 dmg).  I would just like to say that I think the Whip was
ygData.messageBody:
I'm currently having fun with a Dragoon Dirk (23 delay 6 dmg ) and a
Barbed Leather Whip (28 delay 7 dmg). I would just like to say that I
think the Whip was a tad overpriced at 140pp when the dagger is as good
or better and I picked it up for 50pp. Does anyone know why (except for
the fact that it is rare) that the Barbed Leather Whip sells for so
much? I've had tells offering 200pp or more for mine...

Brendel, Innoruuk

Tim and Mary Steed wrote:
>
> From: "Tim and Mary Steed" <timandmary@...>
>
> Thanks for the info!!!
>
> I currently wield a Tomahawk and Screaming Mace, and really have come to
> like that combo.
>
> The Cystalline Sword (which I have heard rumors of) sounds very interesting,
> but if you've not seen it yet at 43rd, I doubt my little 23rd level butt
> wont get one for quite some time (smile).
>
> Thanks again,
> Tim
> Tallonn Stringfellow, Bertox

> you
> >can use staff or claw, but not both, each requires to be in primary hand.
> >and consequently you can not duel wield them, mor many other weps that are

> >Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
